publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1453.2 Mary Scanlon: Health and Community Care-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1453) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, insert at end "and further notes the Royal Commission on Long Term Care's recommendation on free personal care and calls upon the Scottish Executive to unequivocally commit itself to this recommendation and come forward with a firm date for its implementation."
